title: Ghosts R Us
description: Slimer accidentally releases three ghosts from the containment unit and they set out to put Ghostbusters out of business by opening their own business, 'Ghosts R Us'.

title: Killerwatt
description: With New York being plagued by power outages, the Ghostbusters set about to capture Killerwatt, a ghost who has the ability to possess electrical devices. But things take a turn for the worse when Killerwatt takes control of the city's power grid.

title: Mrs. Roger's Neighborhood
description: A little old lady named Mrs. Rogers calls the Ghostbusters about her haunted house; once inside, Egon discovers the house is being controlled by a creature named 'Watt'.

title: Slimer, Come Home
description: Slimer leaves home after Peter yells at him for eating Winston's birthday cake, and the Ghostbusters set out to find him. But more problems arise when Egon discovers a poltergeist feeding off the power of ghosts in the local area; who only needs one more ghost to reach his full power.

title: Troll Bridge
description: An invasion of trolls emerge from the East River and take over the Queensboro Bridge, causing havoc for the citizens of New York. The Ghostbusters are soon on the scene to rid the city of the creatures, but are soon in a race against time to find a troll lost somewhere in the city, otherwise New York will be destroyed.

title: The Boogieman Cometh
description: The guys are hired by a pair of young siblings to rid them of the Bogeyman, an entity Egon is quite familiar with.

title: Mr. Sandman, Dream Me a Dream
description: The Sandman is real and is putting all of New York City to sleep, but their dreams are running rampant in the real world.

title: When Halloween Was Forever
description: It is Halloween and New York is sent into chaos when two goblins release the spirit Samhain from a 7th Century relic. The Ghostbusters must work quickly to defeat Samhain & his minions and prevent the world from plunging into darkness forever.

title: Look Homeward, Ray
description: Ray's heading back to his hometown to be the grand marshal in the parade; but when he's called to get rid of the ghosts in a haunted house and they get away, he starts to question his ability as a Ghostbuster.

title: Take Two
description: The Ghostbusters head out to California to be technical assistants for the movie being made about them; but during the process, an old spirit is rudely awakened during renovations of the studio.

title: Citizen Ghost
description: Peter recounts to a reporter how Slimer came to live at the firehouse after helping the guys trap a group of ghostly impersonators.

title: Janine's Genie
description: Janine wants to go on a job with the guys and helps them catch a ghost. As payment, she takes a lamp that has a sinister genie in it that grants her the wishes of making her the boss over the Ghostbusters, and Egon fall in love with her.

title: Xmas Marks the Spot
description: The fate of Christmas depends on the Ghostbusters filling in for the ghosts of Christmas past, present and future while Egon attempts to retrieve the real ghosts from the containment unit.

title: Janine's Day Off
description: Janine takes the day off to take Egon to visit her family, only for them to be called back to headquarters after Slimer inadvertently activates a dimensional gate machine created by Egon, which allows a group of miniature demons to pass into the real world. Things take a turn for the worst when the demons combine to make one giant demon and it runs amok throughout New York. Meanwhile, Janine and Louise (Janine's temporary cover), along with Slimer, are left at HQ to battle against a trio of spirits who have passed through the dimensional gate after Louise activates the machine for a second time.

title: Adventures in Slime and Space
description: An experiment with Slimer goes horribly wrong when he starts breaking up and multiplying into hundreds of smaller Slimers, and the Ghostbusters have to catch all the pieces and put them together before Slimer splits into non-existence.

title: Ragnarok and Roll
description: The Ghostbusters investigate several supernatural incidents which lead to them visiting a woman whose home is at the centre of where the events took place. They discover that she is linked to the events and that her ex-boyfriend, named Jeremy, has warned her of his prediction of the events and his intention to bring about the end of the world through what is known as Ragnarok. Meanwhile, Jeremy is possessed by a demon after initiating the beginning of Ragnarok. The Ghostbusters soon have to deal with Jeremy when he arrives in New York with his aide, DiTillio, intending see out his plans for Armageddon.

title: Captain Steel Saves the Day
description: Ray is distraught when he discovers his favourite comic, Captain Steel, is to be cancelled. But Ray and the rest of the Ghostbusters get more than they bargained for when Captain Steel and his arch enemy, Dr Destructo, emerge from a page from the last edition of the comic to do battle with one another in the real world. The Ghostbusters team with Captain Steel to defeat Dr Destructo after he takes control of the fire house.

title: They Call Me Mister Slimer
description: Slimer is blamed by Peter for the fall in the Ghostbusters' finances. So he heads off and in a chance meeting, befriends a young student called Mike who is continually being picked on by a group of bullies. Slimer offers to become Mike's bodyguard and scares off the bullies, the bullies retaliate by finding help of their very own in the form of Barrowhites. But the plan backfires and soon the Ghostbusters get involved to get rid of the Barrowhites before the situation gets out of hand.

title: Buster the Ghost
description: A ghost called Buster tries to get a job with the Ghostbusters after failing to hold down many other jobs. But even helping out proves to be a problem for Buster after a whole host of ghosts descend on the fire house which causes an energy build up so big that it puts the whole universe under threat.

title: Night Game
description: Supernatural forces take control of the New York Jaguars' baseball stadium and the Ghostbusters head off to investigate, only to find themselves in the middle of a historic battle between good and evil that takes part once every 500 years.

title: Rollerghoster
description: A funfair owned by a crooked businessman runs into trouble when his unofficial Ghostbusters roller-coaster ride becomes haunted by many spirits. The Ghostbusters are soon called into action when the ride transforms and holds several citizens captive.

title: Who're You Calling Two-Dimensional?
description: The Ghostbusters get called out to investigate strange happenings at the old Walt Fleischer studios, the cartoonist who created Ray's favorite cartoon character, Dopey Dog. They find out the cartoonist, who disappeared 40 years ago, got sucked into a cartoon world where his creations took over, and now they have to get him out.

title: Dairy Farm
description: The Ghostbusters decide to take a vacation after several long months of 'busting and head off to Ray's cousin's farm in the countryside. But their vacation is cut short when they discover all is not well on the farm.

title: Egon's Ghost
description: Egon is transformed into a ghost after the team's de-stabler weapon backfires during a battle with a demon. The rest of the Ghostbusters have to act quickly in order to restore Egon back to normal before before time runs out.

title: Janine Melnitz, Ghostbuster
description: Janine turns Ghostbuster after her apartment becomes haunted and the team are busy dealing with a backlog of jobs throughout the city. The Ghostbusters are captured by the demon, Proteus, during a battle with a possessed Atlas statue, and are being held captive. Janine, with the help of Slimer, become the team's only hope of escaping the clutches of Proteus.

title: The Long, Long, Long, etc. Goodbye
Cold Cash and Hot Water
description: Charlie Venkman, Peter's father calls with big news, he has discovered something in Alaska and asks the boys to come up and help him with it.

title: Who's Afraid of the Big Bad Ghost?
description: The Ghostbusters get a call to a mansion where one incident occurs after another.

title: The Man Who Never Reached Home
You Can't Take It with You
Chicken, He Clucked
description: A man summons a demon to get some magical help. The man wants to get rid of all chickens. The demon gives him the power to make things disappear. And promptly uses his ability to make all the chickens on Earth to disappear. The ghost busters investigate, and he makes them disappear. The demon is embarrassed by how he's been using the powers he was granted, and gives the ghost busters a chance to set things right.

title: Venkman's Ghost Repellers
description: Peter's father arrives in town selling phony ghost repellent ponchos to a ship's crew that disappears in the New Jersey Parallelogram; and the Ghostbusters are called upon to find the crew before it's too late.

title: The Hole in the Wall Gang
Boo-Dunit
description: The Ghostbusters are called out to investigate strange happenings at the estate of the late mystery writer, Agatha Grisley, who died before completing her final novel.

title: The Revenge of Murray the Mantis
The Thing in Mrs. Faversham's Attic
description: An old woman pays the Ghostbusters a visit to end the hauntings that have occurred in her attic, where she hasn't set foot for 70 years.

title: The Spirit of Aunt Lois
description: When Ray's Aunt Lois comes to visit, she reveals having 'spirit' problems in her home. Much to Ray's dismay, his aunt has hired the phony psychic, Dr. Alfred Bassingham to remove them.

title: Ghost Fight at the O.K. Corral
Cry Uncle
description: Egon's uncle comes out for a visit and isn't convinced Egon's work in the Ghostbusters is anything worthwhile, and talks Egon into coming back to work with him.

title: The Devil to Pay
description: Winston and Ray get on a game show that unknown to them is run by a demon, and if they lose, the cost is their souls.

title: The Old College Spirit
description: Peter's old fraternity, Tri Cuppa Brew, is in trouble when the new members are blamed for the pranks being pulled by ghosts of past students that never made it to graduation.

title: Don't Forget the Motor City
description: The Ghostbusters get called out to Detroit by the president of the Generous Motor company when all their cars start self destructing, and the Ghostbusters find that the problem is the same kind of gremlins that took planes apart in WWII are now destroying all the machines in the factory.

title: Transylvanian Homesick Blues
description: The Ghostbusters go to Boldavia to meet the mysterious Count Vostak.

title: Baby Spookums
description: During a rare eclipse of the moon, a rip between dimensions opens; allowing a small friendly ghost to wander off into New York and Slimer decides to look after it. When the ghost's parents come looking for their baby, the Ghostbusters mistakenly capture them. They soon realise their error - but not before the baby disappears again - can they reunite the spooky family before the eclipse is over?

title: It's a Jungle Out There
description: As a professor's exotic treasures are unloaded on the harbour, a 3,000-year-old statue is accidentally dropped, releasing an ancient animal demon into New York City. The creature has the power to give all the animals in the city the ability to talk and interact just like humans and it isn't long before he's using them in his evil plan to take over the world.

title: The Bogeyman Is Back
description: Egon Spangler's fear of death from the World Trade Center has tempted the Bogeyman to come back from hiding.

title: Once Upon a Slime
description: One night Slimer hides his favourite book of fairytales under one of Egon's newest machines to stop Ray taking it back to the library. Only when the Ghostbusters wake they find that the machine has made everything in the book come to life. From Little Bo Peep to Jack and the Beanstalk - all the fairytales have become one giant reality!

title: The Two Faces of Slimer
description: An ectoplasmic entity leaks out of the containment unit one night and it makes Slimer turn into a big ugly monster during his sleep. One transformation too many and their spooky green buddy will become his alter ego permanently. Can the Ghostbusters figure out a cure before Slimer falls asleep again?

title: Sticky Business
description: The president of the Stay Puft Company persuades the Ghostbusters to release the giant Marshmallow Man from the containment unit to shoot a commercial - if they do it he'll give $50,000 to the children's hospital. However, during the process of getting Stay Puft out, a vicious phantom escapes intent on seeking revenge against the Ghostbusters.

title: Halloween II 1/2
description: It's Halloween on the streets of New York City - the Junior Ghostbusters favourite time of year. But when goblins release Samhain, the spirit of Halloween, from the containment unit, the Firehouse becomes his fortress. The Ghostbusters attempts to stop the powerful spirit are foiled as the kids are captured by Samhain and they must send Slimer in to get them out.

title: Loathe Thy Neighbor
description: A family call the Ghostbusters out to their spooky mansion in the middle of nowhere. There have been some weird goings on and they need the guys to stop the paranormal activity before their guests arrive for a big family reunion the next day. Only as they investigate, the Ghostbusters suspect that if anything is haunting this macabre mansion - it's the people that live in it!

title: The Grundel
description: During a demonstration at the local school, a boy named Lee approaches the Ghostbusters to ask for help. His brother Alec has been acting strangely and doing bad things. When the guys decide to investigate, Egon realizes that a Grundel is making Alec behave this way, and if they don't do something soon, Lee will become one too...

title: Big Trouble with Little Slimer
description: The Ghostbusters' old "friend" and nemesis, Walter J. Peck, is back and he's determined to shut down the Ghostbusters for good. But when his attempt to get them arrested backfires he'll have to find another way. Joining up with the BUFO (Bureau of Unidentified Flying Organisms), Peck plans to dismantle the Ghostbusters piece by piece and has his sights set firmly on Slimer...

title: The Copycat
description: When the Ghostbusters are called to a posh apartment block to flush out a troublesome ghost, they're bemused to find nothing there. But as they depart, something hitches a ride on the back of the Ectomobile and soon they're on the hunt for a mischievous shape shifter in their own Headquarters.

title: Camping It Up
description: The Ghostbusters are off on a camping trip and, as they close up the Firehouse and head off, they all agree that they don't want to hear the word ghost for a whole week! But when they finally find their campsite, they soon find that there's something far more spooky hiding in the woods than Ray's campfire stories...

title: Flip Side
description: Egon and Peter enter an alternate dimension where ghosts inhabit a city called Boo York and are haunted by live people.

title: If I Were a Witch Man
The Ghostbusters Live! From Al Capone's Tomb!
Surely You Joust
description: In order to rescue a kidnapped Janine, the Ghost Busters enter a world filled with dragons and knights.

title: Kitty-Cornered
description: Slimer finds a mysterious kitten that can make his dream come true.

title: Slimer's Curse
description: After Slimer wins the lottery, he runs into trouble when he discovers that his winnings are cursed.

title: Til Death Do Us Part
description: Ghostbusters hire a temp who happens to be a ghost. Egon gets into trouble when the temp decides to marry him.

title: The Ransom of Greenspud
description: A group of ghost kidnap Slimer and try to ransom him back to the Ghostbusters.

title: Revenge of the Ghostmaster
description: The Ghostmaster returns and, in order to get revenge on the Ghostbusters, he cast a spell on them which causes all electronic equipment near them to fail including their proton packs.

title: Loose Screws
description: Slimer accidentally breaks a trap and doesn't tell anyone. After the Ghostbusters use it, things start to get dangerous when the Ghost's essence leaks out of the trap and starts possessing things.

title: Slimer Streak
description: The Ghostbusters are stuck on a speeding train. In order to get it to stop, they must play and win a series of games.

title: Janine, You've Changed
description: After looking through a photo album, the Ghostbusters begin to suspect that a supernatural force is behind a number of significant changes in Janine.

title: You Can't Teach an Old Demon New Tricks
description: The Ghostbusters go to another dimension where they meet a demon that is intent on learning magic tricks.

title: Ghostworld
description: A ghost gains power over the Ghostbusters by using an amusement park named "Ghostworld". Egon must somehow set things right.

title: The Haunting of Heck House
description: Peter tells the story of how the Ghostbusters could have earned a million dollars by staying in a haunted house overnight without their proton packs.

title: Spacebusters
description: Winston gets to live a childhood dream when he and the rest of the Ghostbusters head of into space to bust a ghost that is haunting a space station.
